description: The Game of Thrones prequel A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms promises a fresh tale of adventure and honour through Ser Duncan the Tall and his squire Egg. Launching on JioHotstar in January 2026, this HBO production rekindles the magic and intrigue that defined Westeros.
title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms OTT Release Revealed: Everything We Know About the Game of Thrones Prequel

description: NASA’s Juno probe, orbiting Jupiter since 2016, may have stopped operating after its latest extension expired during the U.S. government shutdown. The mission, which unveiled Jupiter’s interior, polar storms, and moons, awaits confirmation—though NASA cannot verify its status until funding and communications resume.
title: NASA’s Juno Probe Faces Silence as Mission Ends Amid Government Shutdown

description: A mysterious streak seen by NASA’s Perseverance rover over Mars may be comet 3I/ATLAS, an interstellar object flying past the planet in early October. Though unconfirmed, the sighting aligns with its predicted path, raising excitement over a possible first observation of an interstellar comet from another world.
title: Perseverance Spots Possible Interstellar Comet 3I/ATLAS Over Martian Sky

description: A small asteroid named 2025 TF surprised astronomers after flying only 265 miles above Antarctica, lower than many satellites. Detected post-passage by ESA, it underscores the challenge of spotting small, fast-moving space rocks before they come close to Earth.
title: Tiny Asteroid 2025 TF Zooms Past Earth Undetected, Closer Than Satellites

description: Amazon’s Great Indian Festival Diwali Special Sale, running through the Diwali period, offers deals on a range of electronics, with lucrative offers particularly on all-in-one PCs. Buyers can maximise savings using eligible bank cards from Axis Bank, Bobcard, IDFC First Bank, and RBL Bank for a 10 percent instant discount of up to Rs. 65,000, valid until October 12. Additional benefits include exchange deals, EMI options, and exclusive coupons, providing multiple ways to save on all-in-one PCs during the sale.
title: Amazon Diwali Sale 2025: The Ultimate Deals on All-in-One PCs During the Sale

description: Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale 2025 is still live. It is in its third week, and there are still many deals that customers can grab. The list of electronics available at discounted prices includes phones, smartwatches, true wireless stereo (TWS) headsets, home appliances, washing machines, refrigerators, PCs, laptops, and smart TVs. People planning to buy a new mid-range Samsung phone can get one during the sale event.
title: Amazon Diwali Sale 2025: Top Discounts on Samsung Smartphones Under Rs. 35,000

description: Activision has extended the open beta period for Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 by 24 hours. The game's open beta will now end on October 9 instead of October 8. The open beta includes a selection of Black Ops 7 multiplayer maps and modes. Black Ops 7 will launch on November 14 on PC, PS4, PS5, Xbox One, and Xbox Series S/X.
title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 Open Beta Extended by a Day Till October 9

description: Switzerland’s gambling regulator, Gespa, is investigating FIFA’s blockchain-based “Right-to-Buy” tokens for the 2026 World Cup to determine if they fall under gambling laws. The tokens, priced between $299 (roughly Rs. 26,500) and $999 (roughly Rs. 88,600), allow conditional access to tickets but may leave many holders without benefits. While FIFA says the tokens help manage demand, critics see them as gambling-like, raising transparency and fairness concerns.
title: FIFA World Cup Ticket NFTs Face Swiss Gambling Supervisory Authority’s Scrutiny

description: Google Messages is rolling out video detection for nudity and explicit content with the October 2025 Play Services update. The feature scans incoming and outgoing videos locally, powered by SafetyCore, keeping all media private. Explicit videos are automatically blurred, letting users review or delete them before viewing. Sensitive Content Warnings reduce unwanted exposure, especially for younger users. Similar to Apple’s iMessage system, Google’s detection happens on-device, but unlike Apple, it applies to both teens and adults, adjusting settings by age.
title: Google Messages Can Now Alert You Before You Open Potentially Explicit Videos

description: IndiaAI Mission, under the Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology (MeitY), has selected five artificial intelligence (AI) projects aimed at making AI systems safer and fairer. Announced on Monday, these projects emerged from over 400 proposals received under the “Safe & Trusted AI” pillar launched in December 2024. The selected initiatives will receive funding and guidance to build tools for deepfake detection, bias mitigation, and AI security testing.
title: MeitY's IndiaAI Mission Taps Five Projects to Drive Safe, Trusted AI in the Country

description: Navi UPI has introduced biometric authentication and a simplified onboarding process in India, claiming to be the first UPI app to offer biometric payments at scale. Users can now authorise transactions via fingerprint or facial recognition, eliminating the need for a PIN. The system uses secure, OS-native technology, keeping data on-device and enhancing protection against phishing. The onboarding update reduces steps and improves auto-verification, enabling faster account setup. Both features are gradually rolling out on Android and iOS to all users.
title: Navi UPI Unveils Biometric-Based Payments for iOS, Android at Global Fintech Festival 2025

description: The Reserve Bank of India is set to begin a pilot for deposit tokenisation, leveraging the wholesale CBDC as its base. The initiative will test blockchain-based deposits for improved speed, security, and transparency in regulated financial markets. Officials also plan to explore tokenising money market instruments, including commercial papers, as part of the broader push to modernise banking infrastructure while maintaining robust regulatory oversight.
title: RBI to Introduce Pilot for Deposit Tokenisation Using CBDC Layer: Report

description: WhatsApp has reportedly started rolling out the recently announced Message Translation feature to iOS devices. During the announcement, the Meta-owned company said that the app will be able to translate messages in 19 languages on iOS. However, it is reportedly allowing iPhone users to translate messages in over 21 languages. It is said to rely on Apple’s translation APIs to translate messages within the app.
title: WhatsApp's Message Translation Feature Is Rolling on iOS With Support for 21 Languages

description: OpenAI hosted DevDay 2025 on Monday, unveiling several updates for users and developers. The biggest highlight is a new ChatGPT feature that lets users interact with third-party apps like Canva and Spotify without leaving the interface. The company also introduced AgentKit for developers to build and optimise agentic workflows, while GPT-5 Pro, Sora 2, and Sora 2 Pro are now available via API.
title: OpenAI DevDay 2025: From ChatGPT Apps to AgentKit for Developers, Here's Everything You Need to Know

description: Vivo V60e has been launched in India. The smartphone comes loaded with a premium and sleek design language. It is available in two colour options: Elite Purple and Noble Gold. The device also features a 6.77-inch Full HD+ quad curved AMOLED display. It is powered by the MediaTek Dimensity 7360 Turbo processor and Mali-G615 MC2 GPU. Check out the first impressions to know more about the device.
title: Vivo V60e First Impressions

description: Elon Musk announced that xAI’s gaming division, xAI Game Studio, will release an AI-generated game before the end of next year. The company has also posted a job listing for a video game tutor to train its AI model, Grok, in gaming concepts. The announcement coincides with updates to Grok Imagine’s video generation capabilities.
title: Elon Musk Says xAI Game Studio Will Release an AI-Generated Game in 2026

description: HMD Pulse 2 Pro's alleged render has been leaked on the Web along with specifications. The image showcases the device's back design, in a purple shade with a  raised rear camera module. It is said to feature a 6.7-inch display and a Unisoc T615 chipset. It could pack a 50-megapixel front facing camera, and a 5,000mAh battery.
title: HMD Pulse 2 Pro Design, Specifications Including a 50-Megapixel Selfie Camera Leaked

description: Oppo Find X9 and Find X9 Pro will be powered by the MediaTek Dimensity 9500 chip, a company executive recently confirmed. Now, a tipster has revealed other key specifications of the upcoming flagship phones. The Chinese tech firm will unveil its latest phone lineup in the middle of October, which is only a few days away. Moreover, the camera specifications of the Find X9 Ultra have leaked online.
title: Oppo Find X9 Series Camera, Display Specifications Leaked; Find X9 Ultra Said to Feature Two Telephoto Cameras

description: The country will launch an RBI-backed digital currency to discourage unbacked cryptocurrencies. Union Minister Piyush Goyal said heavy taxation will deter risky tokens, while the new digital rupee enables faster, traceable payments. Experts see the move as a shift from a "tax-and-tolerate" approach to stricter oversight, favouring compliance-aligned ventures. Pilots in retail and wholesale segments give the country an early lead in central bank digital currency adoption.
title: RBI-Backed Digital Currency to Be Launched in India, Union Minister Piyush Goyal Says

description: JEDEC Solid State Technology Association on Monday announced that its upcoming Universal Flash Storage (UFS) standard is nearing completion. Dubbed UFS 5.0, it is claimed to be designed for mobile applications and computer systems that require high performance, while maintaining low power consumption. Compared to its predecessor, the upcoming UFS standard will bring faster data access and improved sequential performance, while also being compatible with UFS 4.x hardware.
title: UFS 5.0 With Faster Data Access, Higher Sequential Performance Announced as Development Nears Completion

description: Vivo X300 and Vivo X300 Pro, which are scheduled to launch on October 13, will feature a “thin and lightweight” body, the company recently announced via a social media post. Vivo also shared exactly how much the phones in the lineup will measure in thickness. On top of this, the smartphone brand has confirmed that the Vivo X300 series will run OriginOS 6, which is scheduled to be unveiled in China on October 10 and later in India. The new skin is built on top of the Android 16 operating system (OS).
title: Vivo X300 Series to Be 7.95mm Thick, Will Run Android 16-Based OriginOS 6 Out of the Box

description: Ubisoft fully revealed Valley of Memory, the free story DLC for Assassin's Creed Mirage, on Monday. The update will launch across PC and consoles on November 18. It will be available for free to players who own Assassin's Creed Mirage. The expansion will add a new story chapter, a new location, and gameplay improvements.
title: Assassin's Creed Mirage's Valley of Memory Story DLC Revealed, Launch Set for November 18

description: Asus has announced the new ROG Ally and ROG Ally X in India, developed in collaboration with Asus. These are the first Xbox-branded handhelds from the company. The ROG XBox Ally X is the higher-end model in the lineup and comes with an AMD Ryzen Z2 Extreme chipset. Both models come with a 7-inch LCD screen with a 120Hz refresh rate and a new grip design, which is identical to the Xbox Wireless Controller.
title: Asus ROG Xbox Ally X Launched in India Alongside ROG Xbox Ally: Price, Features

description: The crypto market soared to new milestones on Tuesday, with Bitcoin briefly touching $126,198 before easing to $124,000 and Ethereum holding firm above $4,700. Strong institutional inflows, weakening dollar strength, and anticipation of a dovish Fed signal are fueling optimism. Altcoins also show momentum, with BNB, Solana, and XRP posting steady gains, while select tokens like MYX Finance surged over 30 percent. Traders now await whether Bitcoin can break higher or consolidate near support levels.
title: Bitcoin Loses Steam as Price Rises to New High Alongside Ethereum

description: Bungie has announced closed technical playtests from its extraction shooter, Marathon. The playtests will be invite-only and will be available to players in North America and Europe between October 22 and October 28. Application for the playtest is now open to interested players.
title: Bungie Shares an Update on Marathon, Announces Closed Playtests for Later This Month

description: Google DeepMind has introduced CodeMender, an AI agent that can automatically detect and fix security vulnerabilities in software code. It analyses source code, identifies flaws, and generates and verifies patches without developer input. In trials, CodeMender produced 72 verified patches across major open-source projects. Currently, its patches are reviewed by human researchers.
title: Google DeepMind Introduces CodeMender AI Agent to Automate Security Fixes

description: HMD Touch 4G has launched in India for Rs. 3,999 as the country’s first hybrid phone, bridging feature phones and smartphones. It features a 3.2-inch QVGA touchscreen, Unisoc T127 chipset and runs S30+ Touch OS. The phone offers 4G LTE, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth 5.0, GPS, USB Type-C, and FM Radio connectivity. It includes a 2-megapixel rear and 0.3-megapixel front camera, a quick-call button, a 2,000mAh removable battery, an IP52-rated build, and comes in Cyan and Dark Blue shades.
title: HMD Touch 4G Launched in India With 3.2-Inch Display: Price, Specifications

description: OnePlus 15s is tipped to launch with a 6.32-inch flat OLED screen with 1.5K resolution. It is said to run on a Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset. The battery capacity of the phone could be more than 7,000mAh. It is said to offer 100W fast charging support. It could carry an ultrasonic fingerprint sensor and metal middle frame.
title: OnePlus 15s Tipped to Launch With Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5, Support for 100W Fast Charging

description: OnePlus 15T may feature a 6.3-inch flat AMOLED display with rounded corners, a metal middle frame, and a minimalist camera module, according to a tipster. It is said to include customisable multi-function buttons, similar to the OnePlus 13T’s shortcut key. The phone could be powered by the Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset and a 7,000mAh+ battery, with an in-display ultrasonic fingerprint sensor. Expected to launch in China around March or April 2026, it may debut in India as the OnePlus 15s.
title: OnePlus 15T Launch Timeline, Key Specifications Leaked; Tipped to Arrive With Notable Battery Upgrade

description: Samsung Galaxy S25, Galaxy S25+, and the Galaxy S25 Ultra were among the first phones to receive the stable version of the new One UI 8 skin, built on top of Android 16. The recently launched Samsung Galaxy S25 FE runs the operating system (OS) out of the box. After rolling out the update to other smartphone lineups, the South Korean tech giant has now reportedly started rolling out the same to the Galaxy S22 series.
title: Samsung Galaxy S22 Series Receives Stable One UI 8 Update: How to Download, Install

description: WhatsApp is developing new quick sharing options for status updates on its iOS app, according to a feature tracker. It will allow users to share status updates to Facebook and Instagram, without having to navigate through a separate interface. However, users may reportedly have to link their WhatsApp account to the Meta Accounts Centre to use the new functionality. The feature is currently under development and only available to beta testers.
title: WhatsApp Begins Testing Facebook, Instagram Quick Sharing Options for Status Updates

description: DeFiLlama has delisted perpetual futures volume data from Aster, citing suspicious trading patterns that closely mirrored Binance. The move has raised fresh concerns about transparency in decentralised finance and triggered a 10 percent drop in Aster’s native token. While Aster plans upgrades and an airdrop, doubts over data integrity and credibility continue to weigh heavily on investor sentiment.
title: DeFiLlama Suspends Aster’s Trading Volume Data Over Wash Trading Concerns

description: Moto G06 Power launched in India with 7,000mAh battery and MediaTek Helio G81 Extreme SoC. It comes in three different colour options with a 50-megapixel rear camera unit. The handset has IP64 rated build and a 6.88-inch display with Corning Gorilla Glass 3 protection. It will go on sale in India via Flipkart.
title: Moto G06 Power With MediaTek Helio G81 Extreme SoC, 7,000mAh Battery Launched in India: Price, Specifications

description: OnePlus 15 is set to launch in China this October, though the exact date remains unconfirmed. OnePlus has been teasing the device, revealing a closer look at its design and finish. The company confirmed a “Sand Dune” colourway, while new teaser images show a nearly identical “Original Dune” shade. The naming difference is likely due to machine translation issues. The phone features a new Quenching Texture design with an “Ice Skin” feel, rounded R-angle corners, and 1.15mm bezels.
title: OnePlus 15 Teased in 'Original Dune' Colourway Days Before It Is Launched in China

description: AMD and OpenAI have signed a multi-year partnership to build AI infrastructure, with OpenAI set to deploy 6GW of AMD GPUs over several years and chip generations, starting with Instinct MI450 GPUs in 2026. The deal could generate tens of billions in revenue for AMD. OpenAI can purchase up to 160 million AMD shares upon meeting deployment and share price milestones.
title: OpenAI and AMD Announce Partnership to Deploy 6GW of AI Infrastructure

description: Vivo V60e was unveiled in India on Tuesday. The phone is available in two colourways and multiple onboard storage options. It packs a 6,500mAh battery with 90W wired fast charging. A MediaTek Dimensity 7360-Turbo chipset powers the phone. The SoC has been coupled with up to 12GB of RAM and up to 256GB of internal storage. It has also launched with a suite of AI features and AI imaging capabilities.
title: Vivo V60e Launched in India With 6,500mAh Battery, 200-Megapixel Camera: Price, Specifications

description: Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale 2025, which began on September 23, has now entered its third week. The sale event gave a 24-hour early access to deals to Prime members. During the sale event, customers can get a range of electronics from brands like Samsung, Apple, Sony, Redmi, and more at relatively low prices. Moreover, smartwatches from different brands, including Amazfit, Noise, Fossil, Fastrack, and Titan, are also being offered at discounted prices.
title: Amazon Sale 2025: Top Discounts on Smartwatches Under Rs. 10,000 From Amazfit, Fossil, Titan, Fastrack and More

description: Nothing is rolling out the call recording feature through its Essential Space app. This new feature will be available on Nothing Phone 3, Phone 3a, and Phone 3a Pro, in specific regions including India. It can be accessed from the Essential Key or by tapping on “Start recording” notification on the screen.
title: Nothing Phone Update Brings Call Recording Feature to Essential Space in Select Regions Including India

description: Apple on Monday released the iOS 26.1 Beta 2 update for iPhone to developers and beta testers. The new operating system (OS) firmware arrives almost two weeks after the introduction of the first beta update of the iOS 26.1 series. As per reports, there are several minor changes in tow. There is a new toggle for the Background Security Improvements in Settings, an option to create custom workouts in the Fitness app, a slight change to the alignment of text and icons in Settings, and more.
title: Apple Releases iOS 26.1 Beta 2 Update With Background Security Improvements, Custom Workouts in Fitness App

description: Lava Shark 2 will come with an AI-backed 50-megapixel triple rear camera system, the company announced via its social media handle. The handset is expected to arrive as the successor to the Lava Shark 5G. While specifications remain under wraps, it is teased to be available in two colourways, sporting a revamped camera deco compared to its predecessor.
title: Lava Shark 2 Confirmed to Launch in India Soon With 50-Megapixel AI Triple Camera
